verses.roman:
śakṛn-mūtra-nirodho 'bhūt
sainikānāṁ ca tat-kṣaṇāt
rājarṣis tam upālakṣya
puruṣān vismito 'bravīt

synonyms: śakṛt—of stool; mūtra—and of urine; nirodhaḥ—stoppage; abhūt—so became; sainikānām—of all the soldiers; ca—and; tat-kṣaṇāt—immediately; rājarṣiḥ—the King; tam upālakṣya—seeing the incident; puruṣān—to his men; vismitaḥ—being surprised; abravīt—began to speak.
translation: Thereupon, all the soldiers of Śaryāti were immediately obstructed from passing urine and stool. Upon perceiving this, Śaryāti spoke to his associates in surprise.
